original_text: A progress indicator should be incorporated to provide users with clear feedback during multi-step processes.
units: A progress indicator should be incorporated to provide users with clear feedback during multi - step processes .
to provide users with clear feedback during multi - step processes

original_text: Inline validation on forms will help users identify and correct errors in real-time, improving efficiency and reducing frustration.
units: Inline validation on forms will help users identify and correct errors in real - time , improving efficiency and reducing frustration .
users identify and correct errors in real - time , improving efficiency and reducing frustration

original_text: These features are essential for meeting the expectations of modern mobile users.2Performance TargetsCritical performance targets must be met to ensure a responsive and efficient user experience.
units: meeting the expectations of modern mobile users.2Performance TargetsCritical performance targets
must be met to ensure a responsive and efficient user experience .
to ensure a responsive and efficient user experience

original_text: The initial screen load time should be less than 1 second to minimize user wait times and improve perceived performance.
units: to minimize user wait times and improve perceived performance

original_text: Tap response time should be under 100 milliseconds to provide immediate feedback and create a fluid interactive experience.
units: to provide immediate feedback and create a fluid interactive experience

original_text: All interactive elements must have large touch targets to accommodate users with motor impairments and improve usability on smaller screens.
units: All interactive elements must have large touch targets to accommodate users with motor impairments and improve usability on smaller screens .
to accommodate users with motor impairments and improve usability on smaller screens

original_text: The user interface must also adhere to WCAG AA color contrast guidelines to ensure readability for users with visual impairments.
units: The user interface must also adhere to WCAG AA color contrast guidelines to ensure readability for users with visual impairments .
to ensure readability for users with visual impairments
